QuestData.Title: The Southern Wilds
QuestData.Description: I've heard disturbing news from our friends at The Draakorium, to the south.$B$BThe town lies near a swamp, and recently, dangerous creatures have been venturing near its borders.$B$BYou seem like a seasoned adventurer. If you are heading that way, would you mind checking in with our people there?$B$BI would feel much better if I knew they were safe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Prelate Reenu at The Draakorium.
